item.title: R Markdown Reference
item.description: This is an RMarkdown ‘how-to’ for me to refer to when I (inevitably) forget how to format my posts. The information below is aggregated from various source on the Web, with thanks to: https://ourcodingclub.github.io/2016/11/24/rmarkdown-1.html Objectives 1. What is RMarkdown 2. Make an RMarkdown file 3. Export an RMarkdown file into many file formats What is R Markdown? R Markdown allows you to create documents that serve as a neat record of your analysis.
